pros: Mobbing attack has long horizontal range
Very good 5th Job skills that change playstyle
Has the ability to transform into a SUPER SAIYAN!
Has increased inventory space from Master of Organization
cons: Has micromanagement especially in 5th Job with Energy

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +20%] [ +15% & +20% to bosses] [ +60% to stunned]
Crit Damage: [ +5%] [ +10%] [ up to +40%]
Damage: [ +30%] [ +25% after proc]
Final Damage: [ +20% from debuff]
Chance to ignore all enemy DEF: +40%

buffInfo.active: , , ,
buffInfo.buffCd: (480 - 180s cd), (240s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (70 - 64s cd), (180s cd), (180s cd )
buffInfo.iFrame: (Situational), (180s cd, during Energy Orb cast), (90s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where you can swap all STR + %STR into DEX + %DEX and vice versa
  • Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect on/off
  • The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Pirate, fancy and unique' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Pirate, talk to Kyrin to accept a quest called 'Brawler of the High Seas'. Completing the quest will make you a Brawler and you will be on the path to a Buccaneer. Brawler is the 2nd job of Buccaneer

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> - >
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
Option 1

  • Double Down - Saving Grace and Addition
  • Octopunch - Boss Rush and Extra Strike
  • Buccaneer Blast - Extra Strike

Option 2

  • Octopunch - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Extra Strike
  • Buccaneer Blast - Reinforce and Extra Strike

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Subluxe for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Energy Charge
extraContent.content: Buccaneers have a special resource called 'Energy' that they gain in 2nd Job. When your Energy is fully charged, you gain increased stats and access to special versions of previous skills

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Master of Swimming
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

primary.name: Master of Organization
primary.shortDesc: Permanently expands Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc. Inventory.

primary.name: Sommersault Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Perform a kick in front of you

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 165%, Range: 380
primary.desc: Fires two bullets at a single enemy

primary.name: Octopush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Dash
primary.shortDesc: Dash, MP Cost: 1, Duration: Up to 10 sec., Movement Speed: +50, Jump: +20, Knockback Resistance: +100%
primary.desc: Double-tap the Left or Right Arrow Keys to start sprinting to increase Movement Speed and Jump
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
While sprinting, you cannot be knocked back

primary.name: Shadow Heart
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Bullet Time
primary.shortDesc: Max Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Tornado Uppercut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20 or Energy Cost: 85, Damage: 370%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Releases a tornado forward damaging enemies it passes through

primary.name: Energy Vortex
primary.shortDesc: Energy Cost: 85, Damage: 410%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Charged version travels further

primary.name: Energy Charge
primary.shortDesc: Max Energy: 5000, Energy Charged upon attack: 150, Upon Energy Charge activation, Movement Speed: 10, Defense: +250, half effect while charging
primary.desc: A special resource that generates whenever you attack
details:
Once you are fully charged, you gain increased Movement Speed and DEF
  • You gain half the Movement Speed and DEF while charging

Certain skills gain special abilities when you are fully charged
  • Some of these abilities consume Energy and can only be used when fully charged
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

primary.name: Corkscrew Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Punches forward
details: Can be linked with Octopunch (4th Job)

primary.name: Knuckle Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Knuckle Attack Speed increased for 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Advanced Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1, Travel a short distance. Speed: + 50, Jump: +20, Duration: Up to 10 sec.
primary.desc: Using now propels you forward
details: Additionally increases the effects of

primary.name: Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +50%

primary.name: HP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Perseverance
primary.shortDesc: Recover 5% HP/MP every 5 sec

primary.name: Dark Clarity
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30

primary.name: Spiral Assault
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 34, Damage: 337%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2\nWhile using other skills, Cooldown: 4 sec\n[Passive Effects: Corkscrew Blow Damage: +100%]
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of

Can be linked with other attacks however the skill will go on cooldown
  • Using the skill on its own will not put it on cooldown
When this skill is used first and is linked into , you will teleport forward to the nearest enemy, if any, and the skill will not go on cooldown

primary.name: Energy Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Damage: 433%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2, Stun Chance: 50%, Stun Duration: 7 sec
primary.desc: Releases a burst of energy in front of you
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Hedgehog Buster
primary.shortDesc: Energy Cost: 140, Damage: 450%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2, Stun Chance: 50%, Stun Duration: 7 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Charged version is faster and has a larger range

primary.name: Supercharge
primary.shortDesc: Max Energy increased to 10000. Energy charged when attacking: 300, when Energy Charge is activated, Attack: +30, Movement Speed: +30, Defense: +500. Applies only half the effect while charging. Charges twice as fast when attacking bosses.
details: Increases maximum Energy and amount charged per attack
Energy charges twice as fast against bosses

Grants flat Attack when charged
  • You gain half the Attack while charging

primary.name: Static Thumper
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28 or Energy Cost: 180, Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5, when fully charged, damage increases by 10%
primary.desc: Releases a shockwave in front of you
details: When is fully charged, attack gains increased %Damage

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180, Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Precision Strikes
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +10%, Additional Critical Rate on Bosses: 20%

primary.name: Stun Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance for stuns increases by an additional 35%. Critical Rate when attacking stunned enemies: +60%, Stun Rate: 20%

primary.name: Admiral's Wings
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Octopunch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32 or Energy Cost: 150, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 8. When fully charged, Number of Attacks: 10.
primary.desc: Unleashes a barrage of punches at a single enemy

primary.name: Octopunch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32 or Energy Cost: 150, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 8. When fully charged, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 10.
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Charged version has increased number of lines and a larger range

primary.name: Dragon Strike
primary.shortDesc: Energy Cost: 180, Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Targeted: 10, Number of Hits: 12. For enemies hit, duration: 15, final damage taken from Buccaneer +20%.\nCooldown: 10 sec. Can only be used when fully charged.
primary.desc: Strikes nearby enemies in front of you and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage
Can only be used when Energy is fully charged

primary.name: Nautilus Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7\n[Final Attack Skills] 100% chance to strike 2 additional times for 165% damage. Duration: 165% when attacking with Somersault Kick, Corkscrew Blow, Spiral Assault, Octopunch, Serpent Vortex, or Howling Fist during cooldown.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that hits a large area while also granting you a buff
details: [Final Attack Buff]: Using , , , , Serpent Vortex (5th Job), Howling Fist (5th Job) has a chance to deal an additional attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Buccaneer Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 565%, Number of Attacks: 4. When energy is fully charged, the damage of Double Blast increases by 20%.
primary.desc: Releases a blast of energy forward

primary.name: Double Blast
primary.shortDesc: Energy Cost: 260, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 565%, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Charged version has increased %Damage and a larger range

primary.name: Crossbones
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Duration: 180 sec, Damage: +30%.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Knuckle Mastery by 70%, Abnormal Status Resistance by 30, and Elemental Resistance by 30%]
details: [Note]: There is a mistranslation in the tooltip, the buff provides %Attack boost instead of %Damage
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Weapon Mastery, Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Time Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 405, Cooldown: 180 sec\nParty members that received the effect cannot receive Time Leap's effect again for 180 sec.
primary.desc: Resets the cooldown of all skills below 5th Job (including Beginner skills) unless stated otherwise
details: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skills and skills provided from items like Firestarter Ring, Breath of Divinity, or Lucid Earrings
Party members who received Time Leap's effects previously have a cooldown (180 secs) before the effects can be applied again
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Speed Infusion
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 40, MP Cost: 40, Attack Speed Increase Duration: 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Ultra Charge
primary.shortDesc: Energy charged when attacking: 350, when Energy Charge is activated, Attack: +50, Movement Speed: +40, Defense: +600. Applies only half the effect while charging. Charges twice as fast when attacking bosses.
details: Increases amount of Energy charged per attack
Increases the amount of Attack, Movement Speed and DEF gained while charged

primary.name: Pirate's Revenge
primary.shortDesc: Chance: 25%, Damage Taken: -40%, Damage: +25%, Duration: 30 sec, will also activate for attacks that deal damage of a set proportion to the maximum HP.\n[Passive Effects: Corkscrew Blow and Spiral Assault Damage: +100%]
primary.desc: When damaged, you have a chance to take reduced damage and gain a %Damage buff
details: Can also be triggered by %Max HP attacks
Can only trigger once every second
Additionally, permanently increases the %Damage of and

primary.name: Typhoon Crush
primary.shortDesc: 40% chance of ignoring all enemy DEF
details: Applies to bosses as well

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Saving Grace
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When Double Down does not activate, there is a 40% chance for the cooldown to not apply. The next cast after this will activate Double Down with 4 or above.

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Addition
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Lucky number 7 added to Double Down

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the chances of rolling a 4, 5, or 6 in Roll of the Dice.

hyperActive.name: Stimulating Conversation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300 (when fully charged)
Duration: 120 sec, Damage: +20%, self-charge 800 energy at certain interval.
Cooldown: 240 sec
[Passive Effect: Boss Damage: +20%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage

hyperActive.name: Power Unity
hyperActive.shortDesc: Energy Cost: 1500, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 5. Can only be used when the energy is draining after a full charge. For 90 sec, increases Critical Damage by 10%. Can stack up to 4 times.\nCooldown: 10 sec
hyperActive.desc: Releases a blast of energy that damages nearby enemies and grants a stacking %Crit Damage buff

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Meltdown
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
Duration: 75 sec, Final Damage (when fully charged): +25%.
Can use up to 3 energy orbs, energy orb will periodically deal 900% damage 3 times on up to 10 enemies with +50% Critical Rate and +50% Monster DEF Ignored
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Transforms into a special form where you gain increased %Final Damage
details:
While transformed, you can use Meltdown again to release a giant energy ball (up to 2 times)
  • Energy ball has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF
  • Energy ball is unaffected by Damage Reflect
  • You are invincible while throwing energy ball
While transformed, you can double-tap an arrow key to teleport in that direction

fifthMain.name: Lord of the Deep
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, consumes 60 energy per sec, consumes additional 85 energy per attack, energy consumption decreases by 70% when attacking boss monsters.\nAutomatically attacks up to 10 enemies dealing 710% damage 3 times.\nCooldown: 3 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a rotating serpent around you that damages nearby enemies
details:
Consumes energy every second and whenever Lord of the Deep hits an enemy
  • Consumes reduced Energy against bosses
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Serpent Vortex
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Uses 1 Ocean Force
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 10, damage increased by 30% when attacking a boss
1 Ocean Force is recharged every 10 sec, and you can hold up to 6 at a time.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Dashes towards a chosen direction while damaging enemies in your path
details: Uses a special resource called 'Ocean Force' which is gained every 10 secs (up to 6 at a time)
Deals increased %Damage to bosses

fifthMain.name: Howling Fist
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, Energy Cost: 1750
By collecting power, periodically attack up to 8 enemies, for 850% damage, 6 time(s)
The strike will activate a series of additional shocks, attacking 15 enemies, for 1050% damage, 10 time(s) per shock. 14 shock(s) will occur.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slowly charges for a devastating punch attack
details: Both the charge and punch attack deal damage
You are invincible once the punch attack executes

meta: Buccaneer is a STR pirate class part of the Explorers class group. Buccaneers have a special resource called 'Energy' that they gain in 2nd Job. When you fully charge your Energy, you gain increased stats and gain access to special skills that consume Energy
